resources.string: Travel guide of the warm and thriving banana capital of Uraba, here you will find all the information related to hotels, tourist sites, bars and much more.
Application developed by electrical engineering student Jose Antonio Blandon Torres. 04/04/2016
Recreational park that has to service its visitors swimming pool for adults and children, kiosk for events, soccer field, cafeteria, ornamental fountain, green areas and parking.

3 Km. From Apartadó on the road that leads to Carepa, it is in operation the first stage of Park COMFENALCO Encounters Antioquia. This has Parador, restaurant, swimming pool for adults and children, playground and parking.

Un bello lugar ambiental para la educación y el deporte ubicado en la vereda Zungo Carretera, cuenta con botes de remo, piscina para niños y adultos, tobogán, canchas de fútbol, placa polideportiva, pista de bicicros, pista de triciclos, juegos infantiles, brincos (castillo de lona), kioscos para eventos empresariales, kioscos familiares, cafetería, restaurantes, juegos de mesa, zonas verdes y amplios parqueaderos.
In our Restaurant Bar we have: ala carte dishes, meats, pastas, sea foods and fast foods. Visit us in the neighborhood Ortiz (Carrera 103 # 99a-03) to have the pleasure to assist.

In our specialties are the grilled Argentine style field. The cuts we handle are: Lamb, Chivito, rib of beef, pork, and chicken haunches. The process in which we roast our meat is simmered with stakes, where we use logs of different hues. Our customers will also enjoy Wines Argentine, Chilean, French and natural juices. Attend business and social events, reserve the number 3117658163.
carvery restaurant, located in the neighborhood Ortíz (Carrera 106c # 99E-118). Make your reservation number 8282153

The Hotel The 4 Seasons offers the best alternative accommodation in the Uraba region, the elegant design of its facilities combines minimalist elements that refer to the four weather seasons, each room is luxuriously equipped to make you feel during your stay better than casa.Contamos with 12 standard rooms, 6 junior suites, 2 presidential suites equipped with air conditioning, Minibar, Room service, Business Lounge, Internet, Wi-Fi, cable TV, laundry and ironing, parking guarded 24 time, romantic nights. The hotel is located on 98th Street # 100-20. Make your reservations through the number 8289911 or by e hotellas4estaciones@hotmail.com

The hotel has 20 spacious rooms with quality furnishings and comfort, single and double beds, with capacity for 40 people in different forms of accommodation. Make your reservation through the number 8283300 or by e hoteldigmaran@hotmail.com

While you rest, we we provide all the effort to make your stay as pleasant posible.Contamos with 30 rooms: TV, Telephone, Refrigerator, Air Conditioning, Fan and WIFI. Make your reservation through the number 8280219 or by e hotelwilliamsanchez@hotmail.com

Apartado is a municipality of Colombia, located in the subregion of Urabá in Antioquia department, being the most populous municipality in that region. In its urban area, Apartado is divided into 49 districts spread over 4 comunas.3 While in his rural, has 4 corregimientos4 and 57 veredas5 .Apartadó has 183,716 inhabitants, 159,174 of which corresponds to the urban area and as much to rural areas, also joins a diverse cultural mix that meets African descent, paisas, coastal and indigenous, on a plateau that is part of the Colombian Caribbean.
